content.title: Past
contents: I didn't . . . Did you . . . ? (simple past negative and questions)
I was doing (past continuous) and I did (simple past)

content.title: Present perfect
contents: I have done and I did (present perfect and simple past 1)
just, already, and yet (present perfect and simple past 2)
I've lost my key. I lost my key last week, (present perfect and simple past 3)

content.title: Passive
contents: 23 is being done has been done (passive 2)

content.title: Verb forms
contents: be/have/do in present and past tenses

content.title: Modals, imperatives, etc.
contents: Do this! Don't do that! Let's do this!

content.title: There and it
contents: there was/were there has/have been there will be

content.title: Auxiliary verbs
contents: You have? / Have you? / You are? / Are you?, etc.
too/either so am I / neither do I, etc.

content.title: Questions
contents: is it... ? have you... ? do they... ?, etc. (questions 1)
Who saw you? Who did you see? (questions 2)
Who is she talking to? What is it like? (questions 3)
Do you know where...? I don't know what..., etc.

content.title: Reported speech
contents: She said that... He told me that...

content.title: -ing and to . . . V
contents: to... (I want to do) and -ing (I enjoy doing)
I want you to... I told you to...
I went to the store to . . .

content.title: Go, get, do, make, and have
contents: go to... go on... go for... go-ing

content.title: Pronouns and possessives
contents: Whose is this? It's mine/yours/hers, etc.

content.title: A and the
contents: a cake / some cake / some cakes (countable/uncountable 2)

content.title: Go to work go home go to the movies
contents: I like music I hate exams

content.title: Word order
contents: He speaks English very well, (word order 1)
Give me that book! Give it to me!

content.title: Conjunctions and clauses
contents: If we go . . . If you see . . ., etc.
If I had... If we went..., etc.
a person who ... a thing that/which . . . (relative clauses 1)
the people we met the hotel you stayed at (relative clauses 2)

content.title: Prepositions
contents: at on (places 1) at on (places 2) in at (places 3)
afraid of..., good at..., etc. of/at/for, etc. (prepositions+-ing)
listen to . . . , look at..., etc. (verb + preposition)

content.title: Phrasal verbs
contents: go in, fall off, run away, etc. (phrasal verbs 1)
put on your shoes put your shoes on (phrasal verbs 2)
